mapper.select: SELECT p.* ,pv.`name` province_name ,county.`name` county_name ,DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y') - DATE_FORMAT(birthday, '%Y') - (DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '00-%m-%d') < DATE_FORMAT(birthday, '00-%m-%d')) AS age ,GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT po.sys_owner) AS multiSysOwner,GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT po.fk_tenant_id) AS multiTenantId FROM patient p JOIN patient_owner po ON po.fk_patient_id = p.id LEFT JOIN province pv ON p.province = pv.id LEFT JOIN county ON p.county = county.id WHERE p.id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT} GROUP BY p.id

select p.* ,pv.`name` province_name ,county.`name` county_name ,DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y') - DATE_FORMAT(birthday, '%Y') - (DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '00-%m-%d') < DATE_FORMAT(birthday, '00-%m-%d')) AS age from patient p left join province pv on p.province = pv.id left join county on p.county = county.id WHERE p.id_number = #{idNumber} AND p.fk_tenant_id = #{fkTenantId}
AND p.id != #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE patient p LEFT JOIN patient_visit pv ON p.id=pv.fk_patient_id AND pv.new_flag = 1 SET p.patient_type = (CASE WHEN pv.pt_type = '1' THEN '1' WHEN pv.pt_type = '2' THEN (CASE WHEN pv.out_time IS NULL THEN '2' ELSE NULL END) ELSE NULL END) WHERE p.fk_tenant_id = #{tenantId}
mapper.select: select * from patient where mobile = #{mobile} AND id != #{neId}
